SSDA M543 Los Angeles, CA: University of California, Los Angeles. Social Science Data Archive [distributor], 1997.

datasetContactAffiliation.value: University of California, Los Angeles. Social Science Data Archive

dsDescriptionValue.value:
In 1965, Leo Grebler, Joan Moore, and Ralph Guzman surveyed Mexican Americans in San Antonio, Texas, and Los Angeles, California. This first survey provided a rich cross-sectional view of this population's demographics and attitudes.

A follow-up study, MASP II (1998-2000) is available at ICPSR (ICPSR 28481) . MASP II data in the ICPSR collection are available only to users at ICPSR member institutions.
